website_summaries.verdict: A popular wine opener that works well on both synthetic and natural corks.
pros: Transparent corkscrew shell with blue lighting provides a complete visual experience
All-inclusive set comes with wine pourer, stopper, and removable lid that doubles as a foil cutter
cons: Comes with a charging plug rather than a base/docking station

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use - but my top broke after a couple of months - Company contacted me immediately to send new item
customer_reviews.text: Wine opener is easy to use. Have purchased two units, one for friend who saw mine. My top wine foil cover (silver ring) broke and does not attach permanently to unit. I would have expected item to not break. Did not mishandle. Not sure if it has a warranty. UPDATE: Contacted company vie email and they will be sending me out new unit. Unit that is broken then will be returned. Contacted me within 3 hours to advise of new shipment. Outstanding customer service, moved my previous eval from 2 to 5 stars. Company stands behind the product.
customer_reviews.author: erporsche

customer_reviews.title: Just stopped working
customer_reviews.text: This worked great and held a really long charge when I purchased in February 2017. It held its initial charge for a few months--I was impressed. Then the battery died. This is when I stopped being impressed. I have been trying, unsuccessfully for a month to get it to charge again and hold a charge. It will not. I only use this product a few times a month, so it really should have held up longer. It is too late to return this so I want to warn others who are considering buying this to think twice. I am very disapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item 6 months ago, and after very limited use it is no longer functional. Appears to charge, but the corkscrew is frozen in place.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Not buying a 3rd
customer_reviews.text: Lasted only 6 months before no longer holding a charge. This is the 2nd one I bought in 18 months for the same problem. I don’t keep it on the charger, only charge after several months. Love the way this works just not the battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Radu

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and works great
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that the black tip on the end of the wine pourer/stopper came off the second or third time I used the pourer and I didn't notice that it stayed in the bottle; thus, I threw it away accidentally when I discarded the empty bottle. The pourer without the black stopper tip is useless, but I can find no way to contact the company to request a new one. Just be careful when you remove the stopper. UPDATE: I found a number for customer service and they answered promptly. They took my information and today I received a new stopper/pourer in the mail. That's great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Gift Fail
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a Christmas gift and the recipient was not thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Think of how hard it would be for someone with arthritic hands to open a bottle of wine. Now think of a way to make it easy for them to open that same bottle of wine. Well, Ozeri did it with this great opener! I've used several times so far and it opened everything easily. I LOVE that there are NO batteries involved and after opening about a dozen bottles, it still appears to have enough juice to open a dozen or more. It's also a perfect housewarming gift for those wine lovers like me! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: KingFish

customer_reviews.title: Not a good item.
customer_reviews.text: Even new this really slowed down under load. After six months of moderate (once a week) use it has given up. It has to remain plugged in to keep a sufficient charge to open a bottle. Not even worth the price. It’s not a bad design. If they spen another thirty cents on a stronger motor that would solve a lot of the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry C

customer_reviews.title: Value opener for the seasonal sipper
customer_reviews.text: First impression, before using it, was that it was cheap and a little gimmicky. However, after hosting an event and opening multiple bottles it held up to the test. I will say the cork motor the is a little underpowered, mixed with the cheap feel, on some bottles we thought it was going to quit or come apart. That stated for the money, it's not a bad buy for the seasonal or occasional sipper. However, if you are a bottle a week or high hosting family I'd recommend spending a little more to get an opener with improvements in the mentioned areas.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. Will

customer_reviews.title: Simple use
customer_reviews.text: Used this wine opener a few times between the weekend and this week and it’s simple to use and I don’t mind leaving it out on my countertop. It’s nice that the foil cutter is part of it, just twists off and on from the top, this feature is great because otherwise I’ve been known to misplace them. Being rechargeable and working just by holding the down button to remove the cork from the bottle and the up button to reverse the cork from the gadget is simpler than my old manual one, haven’t had to charge it yet either.....came ready to use.
customer_reviews.author: Emo

customer_reviews.title: This is not worth the money. This struggles to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not worth the money. This struggles to open bottles of wine even after a full charge. Maybe I was unlucky and got one that was defective but it never quite work the way that others that I have used do. Not worth the money or your time.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Edward Summers

customer_reviews.title: I'll try something else
customer_reviews.text: I used it for a couple/3 years BUT. After a few dozen bottles, it no longer had enough power with batteries alone. Ergo it is now an electric bottle opener, and pretty poor in that mode. I plugged it in and have used it that way. Unfortunately, it continues to lose motive power. What I've been doing for a long time is to hold it and when it stops without the cork being pulled, I twist the bottle under it to help it along. With plastic corks, you have to do this for the whole pull.
customer_reviews.author: Harold L. Flescher

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, works great
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one of these we have purchased, because we unfortunately left the last one with a friend before moving out of state. We knew that we immediately needed another. Very easy to use and we've never had problems with it. Some electronic wine openers have to sit in a base to be charged, in a way that makes them unusable when they are on low charge. This one has a charging cable that can stay connected during use. Very pleased with this product (x2).
customer_reviews.author: C. Hermann

customer_reviews.title: Love this Wine Opener, wish I had it sooner
customer_reviews.text: I am 76 years old and starting to have trouble with my hands, this is great! It takes off the top seal and the cork comes right out. YOu will learn how to hold on when you are using it but it works great. I have opened probably a couple of dozen bottles of wine now and it is easy once you know where to place your hands.. You learn how to hold the cork screw, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy L. Sturdivant

customer_reviews.title: Makes our wine life much easier
customer_reviews.text: Very good price! My husband got a manual bunny style bottle opener at the wine store at $20. I scolded him for that until we both tired of flipping that bottle opened back and forth and its original box almost got ripped apart because we used it so much. Finally we gave this a try! We love it so much! We open a bottle of win in less than a min!
customer_reviews.author: Y. Y. Chang

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product and very easy to use. I've have done some research on this product and different brands to choose the right one. I'm really satisfied with this product. Even though I didn't use as much but after following instruction and using it, it's a great item to have in your home when you have a party or just relax at home. You don't have to have someone strong next to you to open the bottle of wine/s or struggle opening it yourself. A great investment to have and have no regrets. A plus side it does come with what it describe to come with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery strenth poor.
customer_reviews.text: Battery lost power and was to slow and half the time. Used it maybe 4 times and each time the same problem. I had to use a hand opener to finish the job. I went and bought a new Cuisinart for the same price, works much better. I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Gary Fasula

customer_reviews.title: OPENING WINE IS A SNAP!
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these for my mom who has shoulder issues and trouble gripping corkscrew. When we saw how easy peasy it made opening the wine bottle, ordered one for ourselves. The foil cutter makes fast work of foil on both cork & screw tops. Remember to hold the bottle when you push the button to start the corkscrew insert because it will turn otherwise. Easily releases the cork as well. You will wish there were multiple bottles lines up needing opening when you first get it - so fun! Batteries have been in ours for 5 months, we seem to use it quite a bit & still going strong. We love ours & would make a wonderful gift!
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: No longer works
customer_reviews.text: It was great at first. We don’t drink wine that often. We had it 3 years (9 mos of which I was pregnant and didn’t use it at all). For the approximately 2 years we used it we maybe used it once a month. So I would estimate we opened 30ish bottles of wine with it. It is now completely dead and can no longer be charged. It worked well while it worked though!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I had a different brand before, and twice that wine opener stopped holding charge. This one was fairly inexpensive, and it does get the job done. I charged it upon arrival about 3 weeks ago, and then set the charger aside. So far this opener has opened 4 bottles, and it still seems capable of doing a few more before needing a recharge. Not sure for how long this will last. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Malena

customer_reviews.title: This product is just amazing! Its not only very beautiful but works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This product is just amazing! Its not only very beautiful but works perfectly. As soons as I got the package I opened and put it on charger for 8 hours, as says the manual. At first use I had few attenpts till really be able to cut the foil paper but I got. Just pressed the bottom and pushed a bit down and voilà, cork is out. It made the process of open a wine bottle much easier. Also, the blue light that goes on while youre opening is just so fancy :) so I super recomend this product! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Thaís Knights

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great company!
customer_reviews.text: The company and their customer service is fantastic! The only reason it did not get 5 stars was due to the longevity of the battery. While it holds a charge for over a dozen uncorkings, it only lasted about 3 years. For the price, I guess that is not bad!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Hammons

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: After many years of sterling service our manual Brabantia corkscrew broke. I'd tried an electric one years ago and it was lame so with some hesitation I picked this. However this one is awesome. It has a nice sharp foil cutter on the top and then getting the cork in and out is really easy. My wife has arthritis and she can use it easily. It does whine a bit and sounds like it will break but so far it's good.
customer_reviews.author: Britincali

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, sleek, and convenient!
customer_reviews.text: My manual corkscrew of 10 years finally broke on me, so I decided to try out an electric one. I really like this wine opener. The foil cutter is neatly stowed and works flawlessly. The screw winds down into the cork and back up while pushing the down arrow button. You then push the up arrow to release the cork. It even lights up blue when you use it or charge it. I've used it to open 5 bottles of wine so far without needing to recharge it. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi B.

customer_reviews.title: Good Unit - works for me
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, but clear the battery is undersized. I get 1 or 2 bottles at most without a recharge. But it does work and is very convenient. Since I've bought this I've seen other devices at friends houses where they don't have problems with the battery, so I think you get what you pay for Updated 4/28/2016 - The folks who shipped this to me saw my review and good it on themselves to ship me another one as I probably had a defective unit with a weak battery. The new one is better. I do appreciate their rapid action :-)
customer_reviews.author: Reads a bit of everything

customer_reviews.title: Love this Wine Opener
customer_reviews.text: This was given to us as a gift several years ago, and we used it all the time. The battery finally went out on it, and we immediately replaced it with the same wine opener! It is made well and a great price! You will not be sorry if you purchase it! Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It lights up!
customer_reviews.text: Used it at a lawn concert. The foil cutter is the top of the opener (don't have to worry about forgetting it). Wine opener lights up when in use. Just press button and it does all the work! Compact enough to fit inside wine cooler bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lori H White

customer_reviews.title: Best wine opener... Period!
customer_reviews.text: I believe everyone in my family now has one of these. I received mine as a gift from my daughter several years ago, and I LOVE it!! I bought this one to give as a gift. I’ve seen other electric wine openers that are more cumbersome and hard to use. This one is perfect! Everyone who sees it in use asks me where I got it from. The battery stays charged for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sleek
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift for a wine drinker and for someone that is just starting out as a wine drinker, lol. I don't have to worry about, am I doing this right and then having a little cork in my wine, lol... no more cork...
customer_reviews.author: Notorious Pink

customer_reviews.title: VERY HAPPY AFTER THREE MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: Does everything a wine bottle opener should do and does it well. The foil cutter on top works well and is very convenient. We paid three times as much for our previous opener and we like this one better.
customer_reviews.author: D. E. Mathias

customer_reviews.title: Nice opener
customer_reviews.text: This wine opener gets the job done very quickly and I really like it; sleek, compact and looks nice on the counter. I like it so much that it is at least my third one between our two homes-hence only 4 stars as it doesn’t last as long as I would like!
customer_reviews.author: legallyblonde

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use wine opener!
customer_reviews.text: I had an electric wine opener previously and it died. I found this one by reading reviews and ratings. I love it! It works great. I love that I can see the corkscrew at work and the light helps with that and also makes a nice night light in the kitchen. I haven't had any issues with it at all. When I had a group of friends over for a wine night , they were so impressed and excited when they saw me use it. One friend took a photo so she could order one. Several expressed interest in getting one for themselves. It also has an attractive design.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet O'Hara

customer_reviews.title: Never thought a single charge would last so long . . .
customer_reviews.text: Not only in this wine opener very reasonable, a single charge has lasted me for months. I love the foil cutter being attached at the top so I don't have to root through my drawer to find it. A GREAT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Conto

customer_reviews.title: Works great and takes up very little space
customer_reviews.text: Works great at uncorking wine and it's easy to release the cork for reuse (or your favorite craft project!). It doesn't require any physical strength or awkward positioning of the bottle for leverage. We only recently had to recharge it after almost a year of regular use. It recharges with a simple cable, stands on it's own without the need for a special base like other electric openers. It's slim profile takes up very little space on the cabinet or countertop compared to the Rabbit and other lever-type openers. The integrated seal-cutter cap is a nice bonus. And I like that the smooth surface won't turn to a sticky mess over time like the grippy surface on my Rabbit did.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: The most popular gift I've Gotten or Given!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this wine opener at my cousin's house and actually asked for it as a gift. Since then I've purchased more than several of them because they are so practical, highly rated, fun and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: t gorey

customer_reviews.title: Cork
customer_reviews.text: It is a good looking device, but wine cork decice malfunction. For example, when we place it back on the bottle the rubber get stock on it and then we trow it away without realizing the rubber was in the bottle. Perhaps a minor error by the factory.
customer_reviews.author: LSantana

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: This product deserves no star. After a few attempts to release the cork, (difficult to center the product due to the wide screw) the product stopped working. Sputtered and died. Now removing corks manually. Amazon could return my money for this useless, worthless product. Don't buy!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Griffin Lefer

customer_reviews.title: Best investment for wine opener!
customer_reviews.text: Followed last consumer’s feedback watching video she posted, so glad I did! I purchased and she was right, cuts the metal topper, and easy to open a bottle of wine. Used it for Thanksgiving and was a hit! I was able to get a great wine opener, without spending a lot of money. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Honey McGinley

customer_reviews.title: Ozeri Nouveaux wine opener
customer_reviews.text: This a very good wine opener and overall I am happy with the purchase. From what I read thouigh, I did think it would be a little more powerful than it is. It gets the job done but seems to struggle with some corks. The foil cutter works well and the blue light is a cool feature.
customer_reviews.author: xsentrik

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad for his birthday and he loved it! He loves to drink wine and I thought this would be a great present! He loves it! So far it seems pretty easy to use, hopefully this product has a long life time. Great purchase so far though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon4Me

customer_reviews.title: Nice but don’t use on older corks
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine but base is not long enough or tight enough to drive it into cork in a straight and stable manner without some concentrated effort. Not a Rabbit but not supposed to be at this price
customer_reviews.author: Buck

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a white elephant gift exchange. Randomly enough the party host already had one that we used that evening and it worked really well so the recipient of this one was very excited when they opened it.
customer_reviews.author: Miss M

customer_reviews.title: but this is wonderful. I have had a hard time opening wine ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG, but this is wonderful. I have had a hard time opening wine bottles and this is so nifty. You just put it over the cork, and push the button and wahla.....the comes right out. Then you push the button the other direction and the cork comes right off the device. Have not tried the pour or or stopper yet. But the cork removal portion works WONDERFULLY. To the specifics, it says it opens 40 bottles of wine before needing charging again, I just know that out of the box, it opened one without any charging. Love this device.
customer_reviews.author: Rosierobins

customer_reviews.title: Top-notch wine opener.
customer_reviews.text: WOW! That's the word that comes to mind when using this awesome Ozeri electric wine opener. I used it the first time when I had a few friends over. Unsure of what to expect I used to to open a bottle of wine. I was impressed by the smooth functionality of this sleek and cool looking gadget. It opened a bottle of wine with a touch of a button and in less than 30 seconds. Excellent product for serious wine drinkers.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lee

customer_reviews.title: A must for any wine lover
customer_reviews.text: The old manual cork screw was tough for my wife to use and often just left the cork a mess. This electric cork screw makes things much easier and the charge has been satisfactory. It has a nice look and we do not find ourselves hiding it when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Precht

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I received the product on time and it looks high quality. I gave it four star because I have not use it for longer time but it works great. One of the incentives of this product's package is that it comes with pourer and stopper, which I found them to be of high qualities and plus because similar packages with the same prices don't come with them. Most of my friends also found it to be great product when the saw it at our party and they also wants to buy one. The only thing I am looking forward for is its longevity. If it does last longer, I will come back and update it. I will do so yearly.
customer_reviews.author: xagenda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wine opener
customer_reviews.text: Awesome wine opener!, Purchased as a gift and I like it better than my electric opener. It is easy to use, lights up into a cool "spaceship" blue color when plugged in and would look awesome sitting on a bar top. The foil cutter is integrated into the top of the opener, so you never need to look for it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, the foil cutter is sharp and works great. Totally love this product and would recommend it to anyone trying to survive COVID lockdowns/restrictions with kids.
customer_reviews.author: A. K. F.

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: The tool makes it so anyone can open a bottle of wine. Make sure to keep it charged up it cast a nice pleasant blue light when plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Another A C 52487

customer_reviews.title: Careful
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this for a Christmas gift and just got around to opening the package. It looks as if something had gotten into the box. The box it came in was damaged so I didn't want to take a chance on the product. Sadly, I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this wine opener about four months ago – I am still working from the original charge! It is a great product. I use it about 3 to 4 times a week and it has opened every bottle of wine so far. I really appreciate not having to struggle with the manual wine openers anymore, and I am pleased with the quality of this model.
customer_reviews.author: Joan O

customer_reviews.title: So so with lousy pourer
customer_reviews.text: Main reason I bought it was because it had a pourer/stopper which unfortunately came apart. The rubber stayed in the bottle neck when I pulled the pourer/stopper out after finishing; I didn't notice when I put the bottle in the recycle bin (with rubber stuck in the neck) which is now in recycle heaven. I noticed today when I went to use it for the 2nd time. So heads up to all who are considering this opener.
customer_reviews.author: john t maffei

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy To Use!
customer_reviews.text: Comes with a foil opener and works very easy- No learning curve!! Would recommend to anyone!! Don't want to be without one!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Two years later, I finally had to charge it. Look no further. This is an amazing product. This is a fantastic wine opener. It works fantastic! I could see this selling in a store for upwards of $30. It’s not worth buying the more expensive ones when this is an option. I even bought it used.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wine opener!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my husband and he love it! Such an easier way to open the wine bottles plus it make an impression on visitors since it looks so fancy. Five stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Roman Smiganovskiy

customer_reviews.title: Nice novelty
customer_reviews.text: I expected it to be more powerful, make sure you hold bottle bottom when using. Sounds like motor is stressing to work, but, otherwise serves intended purpose. Wish these reviews would allow 1/2 stars would give 3.5 rating.
customer_reviews.author: DMT

customer_reviews.title: Appears used
customer_reviews.text: 1-* from Nancy on June 26, 2020 Appears used. Also no pourer was included It appeared that this was used as there was a cork stuck inside and I couldn’t get it out until I placed it on top of a wine bottle and played with it. The cord was not wrapped and it seems that it had been used. Does this come with a cork in it? Very poor
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Buy this to replace the old one owned for 5+years due to died battery. Same easy use. Battery seems lasting longer. Does not look fancy but so easy to use. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: lesleyy

customer_reviews.title: This product is horrible after only a few uses
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and used it maybe a dozen times. The battery died and I realized it did NOT come with a charger. I wrote the company and they charged $5 for shipping to send me one. After charging it for days, it still is dead. This was a total waste of time. BUYER beware it is awful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My mom loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mother, with her arthritis nowadays she needs some help with them wine bottles! 🤣 Works perfectly and is very simple to use, even for an 85 year young lady! 🍷
customer_reviews.author: Matt h.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little wine opener!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing - it opens the bottles fine, the charge seems to last quite a while. My first one arrived defective, but I contacted Ozeri, and they immediately shipped a replacement, along with a return postage label. They were great to deal with, never questioned me about the problem, just apologized and made things right. I would definitely buy again, maybe as a 2nd for myself, or a gift for friends.
customer_reviews.author: Katy R.

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient and easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it is to use. Super foil cutter feature, and it really works just as it is described. Drawback: I'd like to see a feature that indicates when it is fully charged. It has a very pretty electric blue lighting when plugged in to power, but that light stays on continually so you never know when the battery is completely charged or not. I've used other types of openers and so far this is the best!
customer_reviews.author: cynthia milley

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! Very easy to use. It did take 2 tries as I was not aware there is a spring mechanism that once the screw digs into the cork it "pulls" the tool down and the spring compresses "until" (this is the catch), an interior non-moving cylinder reaches the top of the bottle and THEN at THAT TIME the cork begins to come out of the bottle. Once removed you reverse the screw and the cork pops right off. VERY STYLISH and we leave it on our granite counters as decor. There is one down-side......makes it TOO EASY to open and drink a bottle that we will spend more on wine!
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Gekko

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy to use when referencing the instructions. Gifted this to my mom who has muscle atrophy in her hands. She loved it!! I would definitely purchase this again but this time for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Tanika Bodie

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy. Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my fiancee. Every time she uses it to open a bottle of wine she tells me how much she loves the thing. I fully charged it before I gave it to her and it's still going strong... probably a dozen bottles later. From start to finish, including ejecting the cork, the process takes maybe 15 seconds. The foil cutter as the top is a great feature. The wine opener feels solid and well-built. The woman is happy, so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without it
customer_reviews.text: I receive one as a gift, and loved it so much that I ended up buying 3 of these as gifts! Included foil cutters are a perfect touch, because not every wine bottle comes with the pull tab, and even if they do they will sometimes end up breaking, so this guy comes in very handy. Position the opener over the corck, and press the button. Presto! Bottle is open and ready to go, and you don't have to huff and puff trying to twist the cork out, because all you need to do is push the button in the other direction and the cork is dispensed a couple seconds later. Can't imagine ever not having this in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Sale Huntress

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful opener for the money!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is powerful and the charge lasted for several dozen bottle openings. It's really easy to use and smaller than other electric openers. Only negative - the top which is a bottle foil cutter - turns and locks into some tabs on the unit. Well, the tabs broke easily. I still use it but it's not as "sleak" looking as before.
customer_reviews.author: Alfons

customer_reviews.title: Quck, easy & convenient!!
customer_reviews.text: Quick, easy and enables anyone to enjoy a bottle of wine. This is truly good and makes opening a good bottle of wine extremely easy for anyone. My wife was having trouble before with a standard cork screw opener but not anymore. It takes but a few seconds and it's ready to pour. It's so easy to cut the film off the neck so as to access the cork and then pull the cork. And NO, it doesn't destroy the cork - far from. Very easy, handy, well worth the price!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly for almost 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly and especially for someone with carpal tunnel who belongs to a serious wine group. Used daily and opened everything easily. In the past few weeks it seemed to be working harder to open a bottle and then last night the corkscrew snapped at the plastic fitting holding it in the machine. Really a shame since we'd been very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: J F Somerset

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish however...
customer_reviews.text: maybe we just got a weak one. So far this has opened every bottle of wine we've used it on. But sometimes it seems as if it's not going to finish the job at hand. We always keep it fully charged, it just doesn't seem to be quite as powerful as our last one (different brand). So until this one fails, it's my go to opener. It does get quite the workout, at least a bottle a night...maybe it's just tired or think we drink to much! Cheers
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Wow... So easy to open my wine bottles now.
customer_reviews.text: The opener is very easy to use. The stopper is too small for the 2 bottles of wine that I had so I took off 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for arthritis!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this opener regularly for over a year. I bought it originally because of rheumatoid arthritis which prevented me from using a conventional corkscrew. It is fantastic! I have opened dozens of bottles of wine over the past year with all corks-natural and synthetic and have not had a single problem. My RA is now controlled with medication but I continue to use the Ozeri because it is easy and cool.
customer_reviews.author: Bay View

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and performs as such
customer_reviews.text: Product “died” after 2 months of daily usage. No amount of recharging could revive. This is a wonderful cheap option. It will “struggle” with more difficult corks that are either tight or particularly dry. I would never reccomend using on a good bottle of wine.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur troy

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This works great and is a big hit with everyone when we use it. I love how easy it is now to remove the cork from the wine bottle. I am very pleased with this.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for over three months now and have yet to experience a problem - no broken corks or corks that wouldn't come out. And even though it gets plenty of use - several times a week - I haven't had to recharge it once other than the initial charge as per the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: ultragolden

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: This wine opener is perfect. It holds a charge for a really long time. I use it about once a week and it was a few months before I had to charge it. It’s also aesthetically pleasing so if it is on the counter charging it’s not an eyesore. This would be a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Trissy britt

customer_reviews.title: Great wine opener - works on all corks
customer_reviews.text: This is a great unit. I've used it for over a year and it is the best cork remover I've had. Easy to use, charge lasts a long time and it is easy it charge, and works on all corks. I've used the professional hand openers, the air pump cork removers that don't work on long corks, and the ones that have two spines going down the side of the cork. This has been by far the best - most efficient, easy to use, quick and easy. And a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy DAO

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Has a little trouble with tight corks
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Has a little trouble with tight corks, but manages to get them out. You just have to give it a few seconds and it will pull those corks out in no time. Wish it had something that told me if it was fully charged. I left it charging for a full day with nothing notifying me if it was fully charged or not. They say 8 hours for a full charge, but I don't know. Don't know if its the best electric corker out there, but its pretty damn good!
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Glenn

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product, a great price and a great quality ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, a great price and a great quality buy. Puts my Oster to shame in several respects. Oster does not have a built-on cap cutter. The clear plastic bottom on the Ozeri enables you to guide the cork in straight. On the Oster you can't see the cork going in and sometimes it goes in on a slight angle, causing the screw to cut the inside of the glass of the wine bottle. Very bad design flaw on the Oster. Ozeri figured it out and solved the problem. Kudos to them!
customer_reviews.author: SJW

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad screw
customer_reviews.text: The light is cool and always on when charging. I had to unplug it at night because it's actually too bright. This is the third electric corkscrew I've owned the other two broke (not the same brand). Hopefully this will last longer. It is not the most powerful but it does the job. The foil cutter in the handle is a nice touch
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: F that’s a nice opener
customer_reviews.text: For weeks my sister was using this when I first got her it! Loves it and sounds better than some I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla York

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first electric wine opener. I love it. The blue light is fun and the wine cutter on top works like a charm. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl O'Hara

customer_reviews.title: Stylish... on my 3rd due to motor failures.. .Customer Service A++
customer_reviews.text: I'm awaiting my 3rd Ozeri... super stylish great when it works but our first worked flawlessly for a few months then seized.. it would screw only up/in remove cork direction and not down. I emailed the company directly and they courteously and promptly sent a replacement. This one only worked a couple weeks then the same thing happened... once again emailed the company and they are sending another replacement. Hoping we get it right this time. Ozeri honors their 1 year warranty fully and impressively. Word to the wise do NOT try any electronic openers on artificial / plastic corks its far too much strain on them... just know this from years past.
customer_reviews.author: mbalzer33

customer_reviews.title: Buy a better quality wine opener
customer_reviews.text: Used in a residential setting the battery did not hold a charge and finally gave out before a year was done. Spend a little more and get a more study product. Was happy at the beginning of purchase but slowly changed that mindset.
customer_reviews.author: Centaur1127

customer_reviews.title: My new hero! Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: This guy is my new best friend! After struggling with an old manual plastic wine opener this one is a pure joy. I've only charged it 2 times in last two months or so I've had it. I didn't know if it needed charge last time but I did just to be safe. The foil cutter works perfectly and the opener easily opens and releases cork! Anything that makes it easier to get that glass of wine is a hero in my book! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C.

customer_reviews.title: The wine opener is beautiful and works well
customer_reviews.text: The wine opener is beautiful and works well. The bottle stopper, however, broke the first week. Hopefully the seller will replace it.
customer_reviews.author: VBD

customer_reviews.title: Pretty powerful opener.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, even on the tightest corks...although it takes all it has on some real tight ones. Only complaint is with the foil cutter on the top...it works well but is cumbersome to remove from the opener body and to replace....needs to be redesigned.
customer_reviews.author: quadman

customer_reviews.title: Quick and effortless electric wine opener
customer_reviews.text: This electric wine opener is awesome. It is so quick and effortless to uncork any wine bottle. The foil cutter, stopper, and wine pourer are all nice extras that add to the value of this package. I highly recommend this product. Update: The battery dies way too quickly now. If I want to use it, I either have to remember to charge it the night before or leave it plugged in. This creates clutter on my kitchen counter, which I am not a fan of.
customer_reviews.author: slumv88

customer_reviews.title: Spend wisely & buy this.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd electric wine opener - used the old one to its death - different brand. I haven't used this one very many times, but so far my husband & I LOVE IT. I thought the see-through barrel & blue light would be cheesy, but it's actually very interesting & amusing to watch the cork come out of the bottle. It has great power - doesn't hesitate at all. There are much more expensive powered wine openers, but why spend more than you should? Buy this.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bertsch

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: The best wine opener ever ! I even bought a back up just in case.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Best cork remover on the market
customer_reviews.text: Best cork remover on the market. The clear part not only lights up so you can see the cork in the dark (if you're outside at night and need to open a bottle (romantic night out, camping, etc...) The charge hole is small / indiscreet. I ALWAYS take this with me when I know there will be wine involved and people love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: CATHY16

customer_reviews.title: GREAT IDEA!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it more stars I would. This allows my hands to not be in such pain when uncorking a bottle of wine. Thank you so much for this product I amend this but will not change the 5 stars. The bottle stopper that comes with this separates when you pull it out of the bottle. I had to search in the trash for the end of the stopper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A-mazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product to no end. It's easy to use and for the price it matches the more expensive brands. Our guests loved it so much we started buying them as Christmas presents for everyone. They too are so happy with it. I find that being able to see the cork coming out as you're using it allows for easy use and is a real crowd pleaser (along with the cool blue light). The foil cutter is also a hidden gem that seems to be quite simple and easy to use. One charge lasts a really long time. It's one of the best purchases I've made on Amazon. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle b.

customer_reviews.title: WOW!  I can't believe how easy and effective this wonderful product is! Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: I've had every corkscrew imaginable, and I still had trouble opening wine bottles. I was blaming the wine bottle corks, lol! My husband doesn't have to open the wine for me! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: LadyL

customer_reviews.title: Great At What It Does
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the Ozeri Nouveaux II wine opener. It's still on the first charge and it has opened eight wine bottles that I'm aware of. I like it because its not huge in size like some of the other battery powered wine openers I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: I love this wine opener. No effort needed. Built in foil cutter. I charge it rarely but it never seems to die. I actually bought a second one for my mother. The bonus cork and pourer are awesome additions. I can't say it enough, I LOVE THIS. Never going to have chunks of cork in my wine ever again.
customer_reviews.author: boo

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after less than 10 bottles.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great at first. But after less than 10 bottles it stopped working. I could draw a cork in, but could not push it down to get it out of the machine. I removed the cork manually thinking maybe it was just stuck. Nope, the top button never worked again rendering it useless.
customer_reviews.author: JulieF

customer_reviews.title: poor power
customer_reviews.text: I had same brand one before that was amazing. Recharged for many uses. Finally quit. This new one started off very slow, like a dying battery. With full recharge, no different. Works, but slow enough that I'm just waiting for it to quit. 4 uses so far.
customer_reviews.author: lg

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for Christmas. We had company for the holidays so it was used a LOT! Worked like magic every time. Does not take up valuable counter space and charges quickly. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mk Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Must Have For Wine Drinkers
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I have made!! I am a wine drinker and have broken quite a few cork screws, so this was really appealing to me. I watched the video posted in reviews and was sold. It is just as easy to use as the video shows and works perfect. Very sturdy and the battery seems to last quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: JeriA

product_meta.title: Ozeri Nouveaux II Electric Wine Opener in Black, with Foil Cutter, Wine Pourer and Stopper
product_meta.description: Color:BlackAvailable in Black, Red and Silver, the Ozeri Nouveaux II Electric Wine Opener combines a European inspired cordless design, integrated foil cutter and free wine pourer & stopper into one ultimate gift set. The Nouveaux II Electric Wine Opener's new motor now opens up to 60 bottles, all on a single charge. With the Ozeri Nouveaux II Electric Wine Opener, opening a bottle of wine is effortless, quick and entertaining. The Nouveaux II introduces a celebrated design incorporating elegant curves that allow it to stand vertically without the use of a separate base or stand. Designed for home and restaurant use, the Ozeri Nouveaux II Electric removes a wine bottle cork with the gentle push of a button. Unlike other electric wine openers, it features a transparent corkscrew shell that makes the cork removal process completely visible. When in use or while being recharged with the included compact adaptor, the Nouveaux II illuminates its transparent bottom shell with calming blue indicator lights. A completely cordless wine opener, the Nouveaux II opens both natural and synthetic corks, and features an ergonomic grip for easy handling. With its fashionable design, high quality materials and durable construction, The Ozeri Nouveaux II Electric Wine Opener is the ultimate companion to every wine bottle. No batteries required. 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed.
feature_bullets: Features a European inspired curved design with ergonomic grip that stands vertically without the need for a separate base stand.
Ships with a wine pourer & stopper and a patent-pending removable lid that converts into a foil cutter.
Newly designed motor now opens up to 60 bottles on a single charge, all with the single push of a button.
Unique transparent shell makes the entire cork removal process visual.
Illuminates with a soft blue light when in use and while recharging.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,607 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
